ComicInfo.Summary: Artifacts Part 2: Sara and Patrick defeat a giant multi-armed killer statue and bring it back to the Curator after it has been shrunk back down to a reasonable size. Peyroux comes close to catching Sara using the Witchblade to get a stuck soda can out of the vending machine.
ComicInfo.Tags: China,Witchblade,New York City,New York State,Curator,Detective Gleason,Sara Pezzini,Captain Peyroux
ComicInfo.Title: Artifacts Part 2
